socialLinks.explanation: Replace the links with your own. If you don't have a profile, you can just delete that element. If there is a missing website, please find an icon at https://react-icons.github.io/react-icons/ and paste the name in the icon section.
socialLinks.suggestion: Don't have more than 5 social links. Copy from other_examples into mainItems if needed

profile.explanation: Replace the content here with your information. Landscape orientation is recommended for the profile picture (600x450 preferred). Place the images in the /public/assets/profile folder and make sure the name of the file matches with the image name.
